template.description: Sprint 42 changes - error handling and file.id
template.name: GEN_Template_v3

processors.name: Store Original File Name and ID

entry.value: select distinct lower("vcenter_name") as vcenter_name, lower("vcenter_version") as vcenter_version from FLOWFILE WHERE vcenter_name IS NOT NULL AND vcenter_name <> ''

select distinct lower(server_id) as server_id, lower(server_type) as server_type, lower(server_os) as server_os, lower(cpu_model) as cpu_model, cores as cores, core_factor as core_factor, '1' as server_processors_numbers, lower(hyperthreading) as hyperthreading, lower(datacenter_name) as datacenter_name, lower(cluster_name) as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE server_id <> '' AND cpu_model <> '' AND cores <> '' AND core_factor <> ''
select distinct lower("cluster_name") as cluster_name, lower("vcenter_name") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE cluster_name IS NOT NULL AND cluster_name <> ''

select distinct lower("softpartition_id") as softpartition_id, lower("server_id") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE softpartition_id IS NULL OR server_id IS NULL OR softpartition_id = '' OR server_id = ''

select distinct product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,'') as swidtag, sku as sku, product_name as product_name, product_editor as editor, TRIM(product_version) as product_version, metric as metric, acquired_licenses as acquired_licenses, maintenance_licences as maintenance_licenses, unit_price as unit_price, maintenance_unit_price as maintenance_unit_price, "maintenance_start" as maintenance_start, "maintenance_end" as maintenance_end, unit_price * acquired_licenses as total_license_cost, COALESCE(maintenance_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(maintenance_licences,0) as total_maintenance_cost, COALESCE(unit_price,0) * COALESCE(acquired_licenses,0) + COALESCE(maintenance_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(maintenance_licences,0) as total_cost from FLOWFILE WHERE sku <> '' AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND product_version <> '' AND metric <> '' AND acquired_licenses <> '' AND unit_price <> ''

SELECT distinct product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,'') as swidtag, lower(host_id) as equipment_id, 0 as nbusers FROM FLOWFILE WHERE host_id IS NOT NULL AND product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND product_version <> '' AND host_id <> ''

select distinct product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,'') as swidtag, product_name as name, product_editor as editor, product_version as version, '' as category, '' as IsOptionOf from FLOWFILE WHERE product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND product_version <> ''

select distinct lower(server_id) as server_id, lower(server_type) as server_type, lower(server_os) as server_os, lower(cpu_model) as cpu_model, cores as cores, core_factor as core_factor, lower(hyperthreading) as hyperthreading, lower(datacenter_name) as datacenter_name, lower(cluster_name) as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE server_id IS NULL OR cpu_model IS NULL OR cores IS NULL OR core_factor IS NULL OR server_id = '' OR cpu_model = '' OR cores = '' OR core_factor = ''

select distinct product_name as name, product_editor as editor, product_version as version, lower(host_id) as equipment_id from FLOWFILE WHERE product_name IS NULL OR product_editor IS NULL OR product_version IS NULL OR product_name = '' OR product_editor = '' OR product_version = ''

select distinct lower("hardpartition_id") as hardpartition_id, "aix_lpm" as aix_lpm, lower("aix_sharingmode") as aix_sharingmode, lower("aix_processormode") as aix_processormode, aix_sharedpool_cpus as aix_sharedpool_cpus, aix_onlinevirtualcores as aix_onlinevirtualcores, aix_entitlement as aix_entitlement, lower("server_id") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE hardpartition_id IS NOT NULL AND hardpartition_id <> '' AND server_id <> ''

select distinct sku as sku, product_name as product_name, product_editor as editor, product_version as product_version, metric as metric, acquired_licenses as acquired_licenses, maintenance_licences as maintenance_licenses, unit_price as unit_price, maintenance_unit_price as maintenance_unit_price, maintenance_start as maintenance_start, maintenance_end as maintenance_end from FLOWFILE WHERE sku IS NULL OR product_name IS NULL OR product_editor IS NULL OR product_version IS NULL OR metric IS NULL OR acquired_licenses IS NULL OR unit_price IS NULL OR sku = '' OR product_name = '' OR product_editor = '' OR product_version = '' OR metric = '' OR acquired_licenses = '' OR unit_price = ''

select distinct lower("softpartition_id") as softpartition_id, lower("server_id") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE softpartition_id IS NOT NULL AND server_id IS NOT NULL AND softpartition_id <> '' AND server_id <> ''

select distinct lower("hardpartition_id") as hardpartition_id, lower("aix_lpm") as aix_lpm, lower("aix_sharingmode") as aix_sharingmode, lower("aix_processormode") as aix_processormode, lower("aix_sharedpool_cpus") as aix_sharedpool_cpus, lower("aix_onlinevirtualcores") as aix_onlinevirtualcores, lower("aix_entitlement") as aix_entitlement, lower("server_id") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE hardpartition_id IS NULL OR server_id IS NULL OR hardpartition_id = '' OR server_id = ''
